title: How George Osborne and his tech bro are investing to break the banks
text:
George is great,” says Theo Osborne, brother of the chancellor-turned­- newspaper-editor.

Theo, 34, says his “incredibly intelligent” older sibling is adept at “thinking through macro issues”.

The Osborne boys, heirs to a wallpaper fortune, are trying their hand at Silicon Valley venture capital. Theo, the youngest of three, founded 9Yards Capital with George and his Stanford graduate brother-in-law, David Fisher, 28.

The fund gathers cash from wealthy individuals and invests it in “decentralised finance” start-ups which aim to circumvent traditional banks. Who better to be dishing out advice on overhauling the financial system than a man who used to run it?

But George, who since leaving politics...
description: George is great,” says Theo Osborne, brother of the chancellor-turned­-  newspaper-editor.
